prompt-and-type-conversion_key1: Use prompt to take in two numbers and logging them in the console.
prompt-and-type-conversion_key2: Then use prompt to add two numbers. Here the student will realise that they cannot be added but are concatenated because they are strings.
prompt-and-type-conversion_key3: Talk about data types and then come to data type conversion.
prompt-and-type-conversion_key4: Come up with the complete example of taking input and then showing the output as the addition of numbers which were input.
prompt-and-type-conversion_key5: Add link to alert() & confirm() functions but do not explain about them.
